actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 518(b) of the National Housing Act for the purpose of extending the time period during which a mortgage had to be insured in order to receive benefits under such section.

summary.text: Extends until January 1, 1975, the time period during which a mortgage had to be insured in order to receive funds for correcting defects in the house under the National Housing Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 518(b) of the National Housing Act for the purpose of extending the time period during which a mortgage had to be insured in order to receive benefits under such section.
